attributes.action: look at better ways in which small business owners can obtain a mortgage
attributes.background:
As a small business owner living in a rented  house paying close to £600 a month on rent. I am finding it near impossible to get a mortgage because my business although profitable has only been around for 2 years. 
But I pay well over what a mortgage would be. please help change this system.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to help small business owners to obtain mortgages.
